description: 基于 ClickHouse + Vector 的NGINX请求日志分析看板。包括请求与耗时分析、异常请求分析、用户分析、地理位置分布图、指定接口分析、请求日志明细。https://grafana.com/orgs/starsliao/dashboards

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    host,
    COUNT()
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr}
	GROUP BY host
  order by COUNT() DESC

SELECT
    host,
    COUNT(DISTINCT remote_addr)
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and  ${server_addr}
	GROUP BY host
  order by COUNT() DESC

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN status >= 100 AND status < 200 THEN '1XX'     
        WHEN status >= 200 AND status < 300 THEN '2XX'
        WHEN status >= 300 AND status < 400 THEN '3XX'
        WHEN status >= 400 AND status < 500 THEN '4XX'
        WHEN status >= 500 AND status < 600 THEN '5XX'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS status_category,
    COUNT(*) AS count
FROM ${project}
PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host}
GROUP BY 
    status_category
order BY
    status_category

SELECT `uri` as TOP_Path,
countIf(status >=400 and status < 500) as 4XX,
countIf(status>=500) as 5XX
FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host}
GROUP BY 
    `uri`

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time,
    CASE
        WHEN request_time >= 0 AND request_time <= 0.01 THEN '0-10'
        WHEN request_time > 0.01 AND request_time <= 0.025 THEN '0-25'
        WHEN request_time > 0.025 AND request_time <= 0.05 THEN '1-50'
        WHEN request_time > 0.05 AND request_time <= 0.1 THEN '2-100'
        WHEN request_time > 0.1 AND request_time <= 0.15 THEN '3-150'
        WHEN request_time > 0.15 AND request_time <= 0.2 THEN '4-200'
        WHEN request_time > 0.2 AND request_time <= 0.3 THEN '5-300'
        WHEN request_time > 0.3 AND request_time <= 0.5 THEN '6-500'
        WHEN request_time > 0.5 AND request_time <= 1 THEN '7-1000'
        ELSE 'N-MAX'
    END AS status_category,
    COUNT() AS count
FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status}
GROUP BY 
    time,status_category
order BY
    time,status_category

SELECT
	  request_method, 
    COUNT()
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status}
	GROUP BY request_method
  order by COUNT() DESC

defaults.noValue: 恭喜 ！当前时段没有异常。

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfMinute(_timestamp) as time,
  count() as value,uri,toString(status) as "状态"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and status >= 500
GROUP BY time,status,uri
ORDER BY time

panels.title: TOP_Path HTTP异常状态码(每分钟累计值)

defaults.noValue: 恭喜 ！当前时段没有异常。

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfMinute(_timestamp) as time,
  count() as count,uri
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and status >= 500
GROUP BY time,uri
having count >= 10
ORDER BY time

panels.title: HTTP异常状态码(每分钟同一URI累计>10次)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL 60 SECOND) AS time,toString(status), count(status)  AS HTTP
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and status != 200
	GROUP BY time,status
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) AS time, COUNT() as "应用"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and (http_user_agent like '%Java%' OR http_user_agent like '%python%')
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) AS time, COUNT() as "爬虫"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and (http_user_agent like '%spider%' OR http_user_agent like '%bot%')
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfMinute(_timestamp) AS time, uri
	, countIf(request_time > 0.5) AS slow_requests
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host}
GROUP BY time, uri
HAVING slow_requests > 0
ORDER BY time

panels.title: TOP_Path每分钟耗时大于500ms的请求数

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfMinute(_timestamp) AS time, uri
	, countIf(request_time > 0.5) AS slow_requests
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host}
GROUP BY time, uri
HAVING slow_requests > 0
ORDER BY time

panels.title: TOP_Path大于500ms请求，占整体大于500ms请求的比例
请求域名平均响应时间
P90 NGINX处理耗时最慢 TOP30（PV>10）
最近1分钟各城市HTTP${status}平均响应时间与PV

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	  client_device_model, 
    COUNT() AS "总数"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and client_device_model != ''
	GROUP BY client_device_model
  order by COUNT() DESC
	LIMIT 10;

SELECT
	  client_device_brand, 
    COUNT() AS "总数"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and client_device_brand != ''
	GROUP BY client_device_brand
  order by COUNT() DESC
	LIMIT 10;

panels.title: 最近5分钟HTTP${status}平均响应延迟分布

defaults.noValue: 未输入分析接口或无数据

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time, remote_addr, count() / ${cal_interval} AS qps
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
	GROUP BY time,remote_addr
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time, count() / ${cal_interval} AS qps,'整体'
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

defaults.noValue: 未输入分析接口或无数据

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.99)(request_time) as P99
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.90)(request_time) as P90
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.50)(request_time) as P50
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.75)(request_time) as P75
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.95)(request_time) as P95
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time,avg(request_time) as "平均"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
	  `uri` as TOP_Path, COUNT() AS PV,avg(if(upstream_response_length = '', 0, toInt32(upstream_response_length))) as "平均返回"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
	GROUP BY `uri`
  order by COUNT() DESC

SELECT
	  `uri` as TOP_Path,avg(request_time) as "指定状态响应时间"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and remote_addr = '${cip}' 
	GROUP BY `uri`

SELECT `uri` as TOP_Path,
countIf(status >=400 and status < 500) as 4XX,
countIf(status>=500) as 5XX
FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
GROUP BY 
    `uri`

SELECT
  toStartOfMinute(_timestamp) as time,
  count() as value,toString(status) as "状态"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
GROUP BY time,status
ORDER BY time

panels.title: HTTP状态码统计(每分钟累计)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT _timestamp, status, request_method, host,uri,query_string,server_addr,remote_addr,request_time,upstream_response_time,request_length,if(upstream_response_length = '', 0, toInt32(upstream_response_length))
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and remote_addr = '${cip}' 

order by _timestamp desc
limit 100

SELECT
    client_region,client_city
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
group by client_region,client_city
limit 1

SELECT
    client_os_family
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and remote_addr = '${cip}' and client_os_family != ''
group by client_os_family

SELECT
    count() as count, http_user_agent as UA
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
	GROUP BY http_user_agent
	order by count desc

SELECT
    COUNT() AS PV, COUNT(DISTINCT uri) as "请求URL数",avg(request_time) as "平均响应",sum(if(upstream_response_length = '', 0, toInt32(upstream_response_length))) as "接收数据量"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and remote_addr = '${cip}'
	GROUP BY client_region,client_city,http_user_agent

defaults.noValue: 未输入分析接口或无数据

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time, remote_addr, count() / ${cal_interval} AS qps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and uri='${uri}'
	GROUP BY time,remote_addr
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time, count() / ${cal_interval} AS qps,'整体'
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and uri='${uri}'
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

defaults.noValue: 未输入分析接口或无数据

	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and uri='${uri}'
GROUP BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time,avg(request_time) as "平均"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and uri='${uri}'

defaults.noValue: 未输入分析接口或无数据

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time,remote_addr,avg(request_time) as rt
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and uri='${uri}'
GROUP BY time,remote_addr
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(_timestamp, INTERVAL ${cal_interval} SECOND) AS time,avg(request_time) as rt, '整体'
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and uri='${uri}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  toStartOfMinute(_timestamp) as time,
  count() as value,toString(status) as "状态"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(time) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and uri='${uri}'
GROUP BY time,status
ORDER BY time

panels.title: HTTP状态码统计(每分钟累计)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT _timestamp, status, request_method, host,query_string,server_addr,remote_addr,request_time,upstream_response_time,request_length,if(upstream_response_length = '', 0, toInt32(upstream_response_length)),'' client_city
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and uri='${uri}'

order by _timestamp desc
limit 100

panels.title: 【$uri】HTTP${status}请求明细TOP100（本页所有图表均关联该接口）

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	  remote_addr as "用户IP", 
    COUNT() AS PV, avg(request_time) as "平均响应时间"
	FROM ${project}
	PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) and ${server_addr} and ${host} and ${status} and uri='${uri}'
	GROUP BY remote_addr
  order by PV DESC
	LIMIT 30;

matcher.options: /路径|方法|域名|参数|状态|NGINX|后端|城市|用户IP/

list.definition:
SELECT
concat(server_addr ,'#server_addr = \'',server_addr,'\'') 
from $project PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) 
group by server_addr
list.label: NGINX
list.name: server_addr
list.query:
SELECT
concat(server_addr ,'#server_addr = \'',server_addr,'\'') 
from $project PREWHERE $__timeFilter(_timestamp) 
group by server_addr

list.label: 域名
list.name: host

list.label: 状态
list.name: status
list.query: 全部 : 1=1, 1XX : status >=100 and status <200, 200 : status = 200, 2XX : status >=200 and status <300, 3XX : status >=300 and status <400, 4XX : status >=400 and status <500, 5XX : status >=500 and status <600

list.description: 请选择请求URI（列表仅展示时间范围内请求量前100的URI），如未找到，可直接输入完整的请求URI（不包含参数），如：/StarsL/api
list.label: 指定接口分析
list.name: uri

list.description: 请选择用户IP（列表仅展示时间范围内请求量前100的用户IP），如未找到，可直接输入完整的用户IP，如：123.123.123.123
list.label: 指定用户IP分析
list.name: cip

list.description:
计算间隔是用于对部分指标(QPS，RT等)计算时的参数，也是展示的数据间隔。
【例如】设置计算间隔30秒，则QPS计算规则为30秒的总请求数/30，依此类推。并且展示时，每30秒会产生一个数据点来绘制图表。
【注意】如果查询时间跨度较长，建议计算间隔也调大，防止产生大量数据点，导致前端加载缓慢。
list.label: 计算间隔
list.name: cal_interval

title: 网关请求日志分析看板
